title: WhatsApp now warns you before sharing screen with strangers during video call, why it is a big deal
description: Meta introduces new artificial intelligence-driven tools to help users avoid cyber scams on WhatsApp, Messenger, and Facebook.
content: Meta is rolling out new AI-powered safety tools for WhatsApp. One of the stand-out features is a warning tool, which is designed to stop screen-sharing fraud. The messaging app will now alert users when they attempt to share their screen during a vid... [2591 chars]

title: AI algorithm proves more accurate than experts in glaucoma detection
description: While artificial intelligence (AI)-powered screening has been validated for diabetic retinopathy, applying the technology to glaucoma has proved more challenging because glaucoma is not one disease. A glaucoma diagnosis is based on a constellation of symptoms, diagnostic tests, and longitudinal data.

title: OpenAI launches Atlas web browser to compete with Google's Chrome
description: The owner of ChatGPT, OpenAI, launches its own web browser, Atlas, as more people rely on artificial intelligence to answer questions on the internet.
content:

title: AI start-ups captured over 50% of venture funding in 2025: Report
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) start-ups are on track to capture more than half of total annual venture capital funding for the first time in 2025, according to a report by CB Insights.
